org.letras.ps.region.penconnector
Interface IPenAccessConfiguration

All Known Implementing Classes:
PenAccessManager
public interface IPenAccessConfiguration

Interface containing methods for altering the policy for excepting or rejecting connections of pens to the RegionProcessingStage.

Author:
niklas

Field Summary
static java.lang.String WILDCARD
          The Wildcard stands for all pens.

Field Detail

WILDCARD

static final java.lang.String WILDCARD
The Wildcard stands for all pens. It is used to specify that all pens should be allowed/denied and can be used instead of a penId in the methods to alter the rules.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

allowPenInGeneral

void allowPenInGeneral(java.lang.String penId,
                       boolean propagate)
Adds a pen to the list of allowed pens in the general rule. This does not have any effect if the pen is already allowed.

Parameters:
penId - the pen that should be allowed or WILDCARD if all pens should be allowed.
propagate - set to true if the change should propagate in all zones

denyPenInGeneral

void denyPenInGeneral(java.lang.String penId,
                      boolean propagate)
Adds a pen to the list of denied pens in the general rule. This does not have any effect if the pen is already denied.

Parameters:
penId - the pen that should be denied or WILDCARD to deny all pens.
propagate - set to true if the change should propagate in all zones

allowPenInZone

void allowPenInZone(java.lang.String penId,
                    java.lang.String zone)
Adds a pen to the list of allowed pens in the rule for a specific zone.

Parameters:
penId - the pen that should be allowed or WILDCARD to allow all pens
zone - the zone for which the pen should be allowed

denyPenInZone

void denyPenInZone(java.lang.String penId,
                   java.lang.String zone)
Adds a pen to the list of denied pens in the rule for a specific zone.

Parameters:
penId - the pen that should be denied or WILDCARD to deny all pens
zone - the zone for which the pen should be denied

deleteRuleForZone

void deleteRuleForZone(java.lang.String zone)
Delete the rule for the specified zone

Parameters:
zone - from which to delete the rule

loadRulesFromMap

boolean loadRulesFromMap(org.mundo.rt.TypedMap ruleMap)
load rules from the specified TypedMap

Parameters:
ruleMap - map containing the rules to be used
Returns:
true if map was correct and rules have been applied; false otherwise

getRulesAsMap

org.mundo.rt.TypedMap getRulesAsMap()
get the rules as a TypedMap

Returns:
TypedMap containing the rules
